title: INC-001: Unknown GitHub Actions commit on feature branch
description: Project lead observed a commit (956c37f) on feature branch claude/read-secure-send-brief-Mz6yN authored by 'GitHub Actions <actions@github.com>' with message 'Update release badge and version file'. CI pipelines only trigger on pushes to dev/main branches. Investigating how a GitHub Actions-authored commit appeared on a feature branch.

custom_fields.triggering_question: Do non-dev branches trigger the CI pipeline that creates the version increase file changes?
